Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001166
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001248
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001330
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001412
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot set yres while level loaded' on quit
